details: Led Rust migration for latency-critical services.
Squeezed 35% perf via lock-free structures, memory arenas.
Mentored team on profiling, flamegraphs, cache-aware design.
Built OpenGL/GLSL pipelines for real-time viz.
Optimized C++ hot paths (SIMD, SPSC queues).
Shipped cross-platform editor with C# tooling.

missions: Hardening network stack for high packet rates.
Teaching Vim productivity and Linux workflows.
